presentation.description:
Hi I'm Chiu as a Front-end and User Experience architect.
5+ years of experience in developing, specializing in the field of interactive and user experience. Utilize structured approach to implement an excellent layout and program the high efficient motion in projects.
Apart from expertise in web developing, I can deal with application, web-server, and resolve lots of platform problems as well which builds up cross-functional collaboration.

experience.title: Frontend & User Experience architect
achieve: Expanded the development flow into research and design.
Introduced development knowledge and professional consult as front-end, ensured team perform and troubleshoot.
Developed the private grid system and integrated the build system into automation tool with team member, improved efficiency of engineers.
Enabled the Gitlab milestones, make sure collaboration and define function in project.

experience.title: Frontend developer
achieve: Optimized workflow, facilitated the framework into project, built the demo quickly.
Advocated the share culture, improved ability of the department.
Enabled CSS framework, devised and develop the official website.
